page.title: 02Day in Life of Trevor Morgan
page.content: On Thursday I get up at 7.45am.I have a wash and then I watch T.V.A.M.At 8.15a.m.I get my breakfast.I have rice crispies.Then I collect my money from my dad.At 8.25a.m.I leave my house to go to Finlay Junior School.When I get into the playground I play Rounders.At 9.15a.m.the whistle goes.I get on with my Eight-a-Day while Mrs Bullock does the dinner numbers.Afterwards the people who go swimming leave and the people who don't go swimming get on with their Maths.On Thursday we don't have an assembly.At 10.40a.m.it's playtime.At playtime I spend my money on crisps.At 10.55a.m.play ends.Then we do some English.I don't like English but I still try hard.At 12.15 we go to dinner.We have a choice of menu.After dinner I play table tennis.
